title: Fire spreads in Victoria as heatwave grips Australia south east , air quality plummets
description: This inferno is tearing through a region that only days earlier had been hit by destructive flash flooding, underscoring the “whiplash” character of climate-driven extremes now confronting Victoria.
content:
